mapper.select:

order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (ID, PHONE, PASSWORD, USERNAME, NICKNAME, SEX, BIRTHDAY, PHOTO, CITY, OCCUPATION, BUSYNESS, BIZDESC, ADDRESS, TYPE, STATUS, REFERRER_PHONE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, SMS_CODE, CID, SERVER_FLAG, MEMBERSHIP, BALANCE, AMOUNT ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{occupation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busyness,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{referrerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{smsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serverFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{membership,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
